import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;

public class Homework2_task1 {

	public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		ChromeDriver driverChrome = new ChromeDriver();
		driverChrome.get("https://www.amazon.com/");
		driverChrome.manage().window().maximize();	

		//time delay to input captcha
		Thread.sleep(15000);
		
		//className locator
		//press Dismiss button for the location in the left upper corner
		driverChrome.findElement(By.className("a-button-inner")).click();
		
//		if (driverChrome.findElement(By.id("a-popover-1")) != null) {
//		driverChrome.findElement(By.className("a-button-inner")).click();
//		} else {
//		driverChrome.findElement(By.id("nav-hamburger-menu")).click();
//		}
		
		driverChrome.findElement(By.id("nav-hamburger-menu")).click();
		Thread.sleep(5000);
		//click anywhere on the page
		driverChrome.findElement(By.id("hmenu-canvas-background")).click();
		
		
		//click on Today's Deals
		driverChrome.findElement(By.linkText("Today's Deals")).click();

	}

}
